prd.overview: The Todo List Application is a cross-platform tool designed to help users manage their tasks efficiently. Users will be able to add, mark, delete, and filter tasks, providing a simple and intuitive interface for task management.
goals: Enable users to add tasks with titles and descriptions.
Allow users to mark tasks as complete or incomplete.
Implement filtering options for completed and incomplete tasks.
Ensure the application is accessible on both web and mobile platforms.
non_goals: Integration with third-party task management tools.
User authentication and account management features.
Advanced task categorization or prioritization features.
target_users: Individuals looking for a simple task management solution.
core_features_mvp: Add tasks with titles and descriptions.
Mark tasks as complete or incomplete.
Filter tasks by complete or incomplete status.
Responsive design for web and mobile access.
user_stories: As a user, I want to add a task with a title and description so that I can keep track of my responsibilities.
As a user, I want to mark a task as complete so that I can easily see what I have finished.
As a user, I want to delete a task so that I can remove items I no longer need to track.
As a user, I want to filter tasks to view only completed or incomplete tasks for better organization.
As a user, I want to access the app on my mobile device so that I can manage my tasks on the go.
As a user, I want to see a list of all my tasks so that I can have an overview of what I need to do.
As a user, I want the app to be responsive so that it works well on different screen sizes.
As a user, I want to be able to edit a task's title and description so that I can update my tasks as needed.
acceptance_criteria: Users can successfully add tasks with titles and descriptions.
Users can mark tasks as complete and see visual indicators for completed tasks.
Users can delete tasks and receive confirmation before deletion.
Users can filter tasks by their completion status and see the correct results.
The application is fully functional on both web and mobile platforms.
technical_stack_recommendation: Frontend: React or Vue.js for web interface.
Backend: Node.js with Express for server-side logic.
Database: MongoDB or Firebase for task storage.
Mobile: React Native for cross-platform mobile application.
Deployment: Heroku or Vercel for hosting.
assumptions: The application will not require user authentication.
Users will have internet access to use the app.
The app will be designed for personal task management without collaboration features.
